Title: American Animals
Writer: Bart Layton, Jon Croker (additional material), Peter Straughan (additional writing), Claudia Zie (adaptation), Ed Wethered (additional material), Joe Murtagh (Writer: additional writings)
Actors: Spencer Reinhard, Warren Lipka, Eric Borsuk, Chas Allen
Plot: Four young men mistake their lives for a movie and attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history.
